name: Klaviyo
title: klaviyo.com
payoff: CRM for B2C Marketing and SMS
shortDescription: Klaviyo is a CRM platform tailored for B2C relationships, integrating email and SMS marketing to enhance customer engagement. It's designed for brands aiming to transform customer interactions into deeper, more meaningful relationships. An example use case is an e-commerce store utilizing Klaviyo to automate personalized marketing campaigns based on customer behavior analytics, thereby increasing retention and sales.
cons: Potentially high cost for large contact lists
